title: Father Brown Stories
description: Four "Father Brown" short story mysteries by G. K. Chesterton adapted for young readers by Nancy Carpentier Brown and illustrated by Ted Schluenderfritz, featuring: A sapphire cross rescued . . . "The Blue Cross"A set of silverware recovered . . . . "The Strange Feet"A trio of diamonds restored . . . . "The Flying Stars"A magician's puzzle solved . . . . "The Absence of Mr. Glass"Recommended for 4th - 5th grade.
author: G.K. Chesterton
